rule: Breifly describe your experiment and its purpose. Identify any sensitive information or variables that need to remain blinded.
How will you ensure that participants are unaware of the experimental conditions? Describe your informed consent process and how it maintains blinding.
How will you randomize participants into different groups or conditions?
Specify who collects data and how they remain blinded. Detail any precations to prevent inadvertent unmasking during data collection.
